Interested candidates should carefully read the official notification before submitting the online form.

item.title: MP Gram Panchayat Sachiv Online Form 2025-26
item.description: MP Gram Panchayat Sachiv Bharti 2026 के तहत मध्यप्रदेश में कुल 23,011 ग्राम पंचायत सचिव पदों पर भर्ती प्रस्तावित है। योग्यता के लिए Graduation + Computer Diploma (DCA/PGDCA) और आयु 21 से 35 वर्ष निर्धारित की जा सकती है। चयन प्रक्रिया MPESB की लिखित परीक्षा, मेरिट सूची और दस्तावेज सत्यापन के आधार पर होगी। नियुक्ति जिला पंचायत द्वारा की जाएगी और वेतनमान प्रशिक्षण अवधि में ₹10,000 से शुरू होकर नियमित सेवा में ₹19,500–₹52,000 प्रति माह तक रहेगा। आवेदन और परीक्षा की तिथि आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जारी होने के बाद अपडेट की जाएगी।

item.title: UP Panchayati Raj Block Project Manager Online Form 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Panchayati Raj Department has released the notification for 826 Block Project Manager (BPM) posts under the RGSA scheme. Eligible graduates with 60% marks and valid computer certificates can apply online from 01/12/2025 to 15/12/2025. No written exam will be conducted; selection will be based on merit, qualifications, and verification. Candidates are advised to read the official notification for detailed eligibility and instructions.

item.title: RBI Officer Grade B Phase II Admit Card 2025
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 120 vacancies for Grade B Officers in General, DEPR, and DSIM streams. The application window will remain open from 10 September to 30 September 2025. Phase I examination is scheduled on 18–19 October 2025, while Phase II will be held on 6–7 December 2025. Candidates must carefully read the official notification for detailed eligibility criteria, qualifications, age limit, and application fees before applying online.

item.title: UPPSC Computer Assistant Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Computer Assistant posts in 2025. A total of 13 vacancies have been announced for eligible male and female candidates across India. To apply, candidates must have passed 10+2 (Intermediate) along with either a valid “O” Level certificate from NIELIT or a Diploma in Computer Science. The minimum age required is 18 years, and selected candidates will receive an initial salary in the ₹25,500 – ₹81,100 pay scale (Level-4). The application process is online only and will be available soon on the official website uppsc.up.nic.in. Interested candidates are advised to regularly check the website for the release of the online form and notification.

item.title: RRB NTPC Inter Level Online Form 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the notification for RRB NTPC Inter Level Recruitment 2025 (CEN 07/2025) with 3050 vacancies under the 10+2 (Undergraduate) category. Eligible candidates who have passed Intermediate (Class 12th) can apply online for posts like Junior Clerk cum Typist, Accounts Clerk cum Typist, Train Clerk, and Commercial cum Ticket Clerk. The application process will start from 28 October 2025 and continue till 27 November 2025. The selection process includes CBT-1, CBT-2, Typing Skill Test (for Clerk/Typist posts), Document Verification, and Medical Examination. The pay scale ranges from ₹19,900 to ₹21,700 (Level-2 & Level-3 as per 7th CPC) with additional allowances. Candidates are advised to check the official notification for complete eligibility, age limit, application fees, and exam details.

item.title: MHA Intelligence Bureau ACIO Result 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has announced the recruitment of 3717 posts for Assistant Central Intelligence Officer (ACIO) Grade-II / Executive. This is a Group ‘C’, Non-Gazetted, and Non-Ministerial post offering candidates a prestigious opportunity to work with India’s internal intelligence agency. Applicants must possess a Bachelor’s Degree in any stream from a recognized university in India. The selection process involves a written examination followed by an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official MHA website.

item.title: IMD Project Scientist Online Form 2025
item.description: India Meteorological Department (IMD) has released Advertisement No. 02/2025 for the recruitment of 134 Project Staff posts on a contractual basis under the Mission Mausam Scheme. The vacancies include Project Scientist (E, III, II, I), Scientific Assistant, and Admin Assistant. Eligible M.Sc. and B.Tech candidates from relevant fields can apply online from 24/11/2025 to 14/12/2025. No application fee is mentioned in the notification. The engagement will initially be for one year and may be extended based on performance up to 31 March 2026.

item.title: RRC NR Apprentice Online Form 2025
item.description: Northern Railway has released the Act Apprentice Recruitment 2025 for 4116 posts across multiple clusters. Eligible candidates with 10th pass and ITI (NCVT/SCVT) can apply online. The selection will be based on a merit list prepared from 10th and ITI marks. The application process begins from 25 November 2025 and continues till 24 December 2025. No written exam or interview will be conducted. Interested candidates must check the eligibility, age limit, application fees, and required documents before submitting the online form.

item.title: RSPCB JSO & JEE Online Form 2025
item.description: RSPCB has announced 100 vacancies for Junior Scientific Officer and Junior Environmental Engineer. Candidates can apply online from 26 November to 16 December 2025. The notification includes eligibility criteria, age limits, application fees and detailed instructions for uploading documents and completing the online form.

item.title: BOI Specialist Officer Online Form 2025
item.description: Bank of India has released the Specialist Officer Recruitment 2025 for a total of 115 vacancies in Scale II III and IV. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17/11/2025 to 30/11/2025. The recruitment includes various posts in IT Risk Finance Law Engineering Fintech Data Science and Security fields. Selection will be based on an online test and/or interview. Interested applicants must check the required qualification age limit and fees before submitting the form.

item.title: CSIR CDRI Technical Assistant & Technician Online Form 2025
item.description: CSIR CDRI has released Advt. No. 10/2025 for the recruitment of 44 posts including Technical Assistant and Technician (1). Online applications will be accepted from 25/11/2025 to 26/12/2025. Candidates across India are eligible to apply. Required qualifications include B.Sc./Diploma for Technical Assistant and 10th + ITI for Technician. The selection process consists of a written examination followed by a skill test as per the post requirements.

item.title: Adhar Card Dwonload- and Address Update
item.description:
Aadhaar Card – Important Information
Details Description
Document Name Aadhaar Card
Issuing Authority UIDAI (Unique Identification Authority of India)
Aadhaar Number 12-digit unique identity number
Type of ID Proof of Identity and Proof of Address
Used For Bank account, SIM card, government schemes, pension, scholarship, subsidy, KYC, etc.
Eligibility Any resident of India, including children
Required Documents Proof of Identity, Proof of Address, Date of Birth document (as per UIDAI list)
How to Enrol Visit nearest Aadhaar Enrolment/Update Centre with required documents and biometrics
Download Aadhaar From UIDAI website or mAadhaar app using Aadhaar Number / Enrolment ID and OTP
PDF Password Format First 4 letters of name in CAPITAL + Year of Birth (e.g., VIKR2001)
Update Options Name, Address, Date of Birth, Mobile Number, Email, Photo, Biometrics (as per UIDAI rules)
Update Charges ₹50 for demographic update, ₹100 for biometric update (may change as per UIDAI)
Official Website https://uidai.gov.in and https://myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in
Important Note Aadhaar is an identity proof, not proof of citizenship.

item.title: UP Police CO Recruitment 2024 - Syllabus
item.description: UP Police invited online applications for the recruitment of Programmer Grade-2 and Computer Operator Grade-A from 07/01/2024 to 28/01/2024. The last date for fee payment was 31/01/2024, and the correction window was open from 01/02/2024 to 02/02/2024. The written examination is scheduled for 01/11/2025, and the admit card will be available three days before the exam. Eligible candidates—12th PCM passed with O Level or a related Diploma—can apply through the official UPPBPB website.

item.title: Bihar STET Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) will release the BSTET / STET 2025 Answer Key soon on the official website. The exam was held on 14 October 2025, and the application process closed on 05 October 2025. Candidates can check their Answer Key by logging in with their Enrollment Number, Registration Number, or Date of Birth. A direct link to download the Answer Key is available below.

item.title: ONGC Apprentice Online Form 2025
item.description: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited (ONGC) has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025 under the Apprentices Act, 1961. A total of 2743 vacancies have been announced across India in various sectors such as Northern, Western, Eastern, Southern, Mumbai, and Central.Eligible candidates with ITI, Diploma, or Graduate qualifications can apply for trades like Fitter, Electrician, Computer Operator, Lab Chemist, Mechanical Executive, Accounts Executive, and others. The online application process began on 16/10/2025 and will continue till 06/11/2025 through the official ONGC Apprentice portal – ongcapprentices.ongc.co.in. Selection will be based on merit of qualifying exam marks, and no examination fee is required. Selected apprentices will receive a monthly stipend up to ₹12,300 during the 12-month training period.

item.title: AAI Graduate & Diploma Apprenticeship Online Form 2025
item.description: Airports Authority of India (AAI) has announced the AAI Apprentice Recruitment 2025-26 for 20 posts of Graduate and Diploma Apprentices under the Apprentices Act, 1961 at RCDU/FIU/CRSD & E&M Workshop, Safdarjung Airport, New Delhi. Candidates who have completed their BE/B.Tech, BCA, B.Sc, B.Com, BA, BBA, or Diploma (Mechanical, Automobile, EEE, ECE, Instrumentation, Material Management) after 2021 are eligible to apply. The apprenticeship duration will be 1 year, with a monthly stipend of ₹15,000 for graduates and ₹12,000 for diploma holders. Selection will be based on merit and document verification, and applications can be submitted through the NATS portal (nats.education.gov.in) till 24 November 2025. Preference will be given to candidates from the Delhi/NCR region.

item.title: NABARD Assistant Manager Grade A Online Form 2025
item.description: The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has released the Grade A Assistant Manager Recruitment 2025 notification for 91 vacancies across various streams including Generalist, Agriculture, IT, Finance, Legal, and Protocol & Security Service. Eligible candidates can apply online from 08 November 2025 to 30 November 2025 at www.nabard.org. Applicants must hold a relevant Bachelor’s or Master’s degree depending on the discipline. The selection process includes Preliminary, Main, and Interview rounds. NABARD offers an attractive salary of around ₹ 1 lakh/month (including allowances) and a prestigious career in rural development and agricultural banking. Candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying online.

item.title: NPCIL Deputy Manager & Jr. Hindi Translator Online Form 2025
item.description: The Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited (NPCIL) has released the NPCIL Recruitment 2025 notification for 122 vacancies including Deputy Manager (HR, F&A, C&MM, Legal) and Junior Hindi Translator (JHT). The online application process will be open from 07 November to 27 November 2025 at npcilcareers.co.in. Candidates with MBA, CA, CMA, CFA, LLB, or Postgraduate qualifications can apply online. The selection process includes an Online Test and Interview for Deputy Manager posts and a Preliminary plus Advanced Test for JHT. Selected candidates will receive a salary of up to ₹86,955 per month along with various allowances and benefits. Posting can be anywhere in India under the Department of Atomic Energy.

item.title: UPPRPB One Time Registration 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has launched the One Time Registration (OTR) 2025 process for all aspiring candidates. This OTR is mandatory for those who wish to apply for any upcoming UP Police recruitment exams. By completing the OTR once, candidates will not need to repeatedly enter their details for each application. This system ensures a faster, more transparent, and convenient application process. Interested candidates can register online at uppbpb.gov.in.

item.title: SIDBI AM Grade A and B Phase II Result 2025
item.description: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Assistant Manager Grade A (General) and Manager Grade B (General, Legal, IT) posts, with a total of 76 vacancies. This is a great opportunity for candidates holding a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in fields like Commerce, Economics, Law, Engineering, Management, or related disciplines. A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience is required for all Grade B positions. The application process will be conducted online, and the postings will be pan-India. Interested candidates are advised to visit the official website www.sidbi.in to check complete details and apply. For eligibility criteria, experience requirements, and selection procedure, please refer to the official notification.

item.title: MPPGCL Assistant & Junior Engineer Online Form 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Power Generating Company Limited (MPPGCL) has released the Phase-II Recruitment 2025-26 notification for 131 posts of Assistant Engineer, Junior Engineer, Chemist, and Office Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17 October 2025 to 15 November 2025 through the MPOnline portal at https://chayan.mponline.gov.in. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification. Candidates must hold the prescribed qualifications (BE/B.Tech/Diploma/M.Sc/12th + Computer Diploma) as per post. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for technical and administrative aspirants in the MP Power sector under a government enterprise.

item.title: SBI Clerk (Junior Associate) Pre Result 2025 Out
item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Junior Associate (Customer Support & Sales) recruitment under Advertisement No. CRPD/CR/2025-26/06. A total of 5583 vacancies have been announced, including 5180 regular and 403 backlog posts, to be filled across various states. The online application process will be open from 06 August to 26 August 2025. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline, with final year students also eligible to apply provisionally. The age limit is 20 to 28 years as on 01 April 2025, with age relaxation applicable as per government rules. The selection process includes an online Preliminary Exam, Main Exam, and a Local Language Proficiency Test (if applicable). The Preliminary exam is expected in September 2025, and the Main exam in November 2025. The starting basic salary is ₹26,730/-, with gross monthly emoluments of around ₹46,000/- in metro cities. The application fee is ₹750/- for General/OBC/EWS, while it is exempted for SC/ST/PwBD/Ex-servicemen. Selected candidates will be posted in the state/circle they apply for, and no inter-state transfer will be allowed. Interested candidates can apply online through the SBI official website: https://sbi.co.in/web/careers.

item.title: RBI Officers Grade A & B Result 2025
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 28 vacancies for various Grade A and B Officer posts under the 2025 recruitment drive. The available posts include Law Officer, Manager (Technical – Civil and Electrical), Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha), and Assistant Manager (Protocol & Security). Candidates applying for these positions must meet the minimum educational qualifications such as LLB, BE/B.Tech, Master’s Degree, or have military experience, along with relevant work experience where required. This is a great opportunity for eligible candidates to join the RBI as an officer and contribute to the nation’s central banking system. Interested applicants can submit their applications through the official RBI website within the given deadline.

item.title: IB ACIO-II/Tech Online Form 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs, has released the official notification for IB ACIO-II/Technical Recruitment 2025. A total of 258 vacancies are available for disciplines in Computer Science & Information Technology and Electronics & Communication. Eligible candidates with valid GATE 2023, 2024, or 2025 scores can apply online from 25/10/2025 to 16/11/2025 through www.mha.gov.in. The recruitment includes Level-7 pay scale (₹44,900–₹1,42,400), with additional security allowances and other benefits. Selection will be based on GATE score, Skill Test, and Interview.

item.title: ISRO SAC Group C Online Form 2025
item.description: Space Applications Centre (SAC), Ahmedabad – Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has released a recruitment notification for 55 vacancies of Technician ‘B’ and Pharmacist ‘A’ under Group ‘C’ posts. Eligible candidates can apply online through sac.gov.in from 24 October 2025 to 13 November 2025. The recruitment includes various trades such as Fitter, Machinist, Electrician, Electronics Mechanic, IT/ICTSM, Lab Assistant (Chemical Plant) and Refrigeration & Air Conditioning. The selection process consists of a Written Test followed by a Skill Test (qualifying nature). Salary: Level 3 (₹21,700–₹69,100) for Technician B and Level 5 (₹29,200–₹92,300) for Pharmacist A Age Limit: 18–35 years (as on 13/11/2025) Qualification: 10th Pass + ITI/NTC/NAC in relevant trade or Diploma in Pharmacy (First Class)

item.title: SBI SCO Wealth Management Online Form 2025
item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Wealth Management Recruitment 2025 under the Specialist Cadre Officer (SCO) category. A total of 103 vacancies are available for posts like Head, Zonal Head, Regional Head, Relationship Manager, Investment Specialist, Investment Officer, and others. Eligible candidates can apply online from 27/10/2025 to 17/11/2025 through the official website sbi.bank.in/web/careers. The selection will be based on a personal interview only.

item.title: SEBI Assistant Manager Grade A Online Form 2025
item.description: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has released the SEBI Officer Grade A (Assistant Manager) Recruitment 2025 notification for 110 vacancies across various streams including General, Legal, IT, Research, Official Language, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. The online application process will be open from 30/10/2025 to 28/11/2025. The Phase-I exam is scheduled for 10/01/2026 and Phase-II for 21/02/2026. Candidates must possess a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in relevant disciplines and be below 30 years of age as on 30/09/2025. The selection process consists of Phase-I, Phase-II, and Interview. The pay scale ranges from ₹62,500 to ₹1,26,100 with an approximate gross salary of ₹1.84 lakh per month (without accommodation). Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website www.sebi.gov.in.

item.title: MPHC Data Processing Assistant Online Form 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh High Court (MPHC) has announced the Data Processing Assistant (DPA) Recruitment 2025 under advertisement S2A/Exam/DPA/2025 for 41 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a BCA or B.Sc. (Computer Science/IT) degree and at least 60% marks, along with 3 years of data entry experience, can apply online from 29/10/2025 to 19/11/2025 through mphc.gov.in. The selection process includes a Preliminary Exam, Practical Test, and Interview, and the final merit will be based on Practical and Interview marks. The pay scale is ₹5200–20200 + Grade Pay ₹2400, and the application fees are ₹943.40 for UR and ₹743.40 for Reserved categories.

item.title: NHAI Various Posts Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
item.description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has released a notification for direct recruitment 2025 under the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways. Eligible candidates can apply online for various posts including Deputy Manager (Finance & Accounts), Accountant, Stenographer, Library Assistant, and Junior Translation Officer. The application process starts from 30/10/2025 and continues till 15/12/2025. Candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying at nhai.gov.in

item.title: UPPSC APO Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released the official notification for Assistant Prosecution Officer (APO) Recruitment 2025 with 182 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a Law degree (LLB) can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 16 October 2025 through the UPPSC portal. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview, followed by document verification and medical examination. Applicants must be between 21 to 40 years of age as on 1 July 2025. The pay scale ranges from Rs. 47,600 to Rs. 1,51,100, offering a great career opportunity for law graduates in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable Sports Quota Bharti 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Police has announced 167 Sports Quota Constable vacancies for 2025. Applications will be accepted online between 12th September and 1st October 2025. Selection will consider CET 2024 score, sports performance, and physical criteria.

Bihar BPSC AES Notification 2025 : How To Apply

  • Read the Official Notification: Carefully read the complete advertisement/notification for eligibility and instructions.
  • Register as a New User: If you are a new user, click on "New Registration" and fill in the basic details to create your account.
  • Login to Your Account: Use your registered email/mobile number and password to log in.
  • Fill the Application Form: Enter personal details, qualifications, and other required information.
  • Upload Documents: Upload scanned copies of your photograph, signature, and relevant documents.
  • Pay the Application Fee: Pay the fee online via Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking / UPI.
  • Preview and Submit: Check all details carefully and submit the form.
  • Print the Final Application Form: After successful submission, download or print the final application form for your records.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO 2025 Online Form
item.description: राजस्थान कर्मचारी चयन बोर्ड (RSSB) द्वारा ग्राम विकास अधिकारी (VDO) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी कर दी गई है। इच्छुक और पात्र उम्मीदवार जो भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक हैं और जिनके पास O लेवल, COPA, DPCS, कंप्यूटर डिप्लोमा या RS-CIT प्रमाण पत्र है, वे इस भर्ती के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से जुड़ी पात्रता, आयु सीमा, आवेदन तिथि, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: HRRL Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Hindustan Petroleum Rajasthan Refinery Limited (HRRL) has released a recruitment notification for 131 vacancies across various departments including Engineering (Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Instrumentation), HR, Finance, Legal, Fire & Safety, and Medical.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable 2025 New Examdate
item.description:
राजस्थान पुलिस कांस्टेबल भर्ती पात्रता मानदंड
पद का नाम कुल पद राजस्थान पुलिस कांस्टेबल पात्रता

  • राजस्थान सीईटी 10+2 स्तर परीक्षा उत्तीर्ण

item.title: RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Vacancy 2025 - Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Recruitment 2025 के अंतर्गत राजस्थान उच्च न्यायालय द्वारा चपरासी (Class IV) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी की गई है (विज्ञापन संख्या: रा.उ.न्या.जो./परीक्षा प्रकोष्ठ/अधीनस्थ न्यायालय/च.श्रे.क./2025/2349)। इस भर्ती के लिए अभ्यर्थी को किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10वीं (माध्यमिक) उत्तीर्ण होना आवश्यक है। साथ ही देवनागरी लिपि में हिंदी का व्यावहारिक ज्ञान और राजस्थान की संस्कृति की जानकारी भी अनिवार्य है। इस भर्ती में राजस्थान राज्य के अभ्यर्थी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, साथ ही अन्य राज्यों के उम्मीदवार भी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, लेकिन उन्हें अनारक्षित श्रेणी (Unreserved Category) में माना जाएगा और किसी प्रकार का आरक्षण प्राप्त नहीं होगा। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन होगी और विस्तृत जानकारी व आवेदन के लिए आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hcraj.nic.in पर विज़िट करें।

item.title: Rajasthan HC Driver Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.
